bug.summary: [BUG] waveshare v1 does not display pwnagotchi correctly
bug.description:
Since the installation of the RC1 my pwnagotchi does not display correctly anymore. I think one reason is, that the display is no longer reset when the gotchi starts (or at least it looks like this). Describe the bug See imagd To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Install RC1 on a pi with waveshare v1 display Enjoy
Expected behavior I'd expect a clearer picture. Screenshots <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1718655/66487974-8732b580-eaad-11e9-9a43-efcbd399d517.jpg></denchmark-link>
Environment (please complete the following information):
Pwnagotchi version - RC1 OS version Type of hardware - pi0w, waveshare v1 Any additional hardware used
Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.

you can try to manually stop the service (sudo service pwnagotchi stop), clearing the display manually (sudo pwnagotchi --clear) and restart (sudo service pwnagotchi start). It might be an hardware issue and the reason why there's a V2 of that display :D Your help debugging this is precious and appreciated, thanks üëç
